          <title>
            <string language="en">Metal compound composition in metal ores</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Metallzusammengesetzter Aufbau in den 
Metallerzen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Composition composée en métal en minerais en 
métal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Composição composta do metal em minérios do 
metal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Composizione compound nel metallo in minerali del
metallo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σύνθετη σύνθεση μετάλλων στα μεταλλεύματα μετάλλων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Composición compuesta del metal en minerales del
metal</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram compares the compositions of metal compounds and waste material in nickel, iron, and copper ores 100 g each.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">metals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">compounds</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">copper</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">iron</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nickel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ores</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">waste materials</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm vergleicht den Aufbau der 
Metallmittel und Abfall in des Eisens und Kupfererzen 100 g jeder des 
Nickels.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme compare les compositions des 
composés en métal et les déchets en nickel, fer, et minerais de 
cuivre 100 g chacun.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama compara as composições de 
compostos do metal e o material waste niquelar, em ferro, e nos 
minérios de cobre 100 g cada um.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema confronta le composizioni dei 
residui del metallo ed il materiale riciclato in minerali di rame 100 
il g ciascuno del nichel, del ferro e.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα συγκρίνει τις συνθέσεις των ενώσεων
μετάλλων και των αποβλήτων στο νικέλιο, το σίδηρο, και τα 
μεταλλεύματα χαλκού 100 γ κάθε.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama compara las composiciones de los 
compuestos del metal y el material de desecho en níquel, hierro, y 
los minerales de cobre 100 g cada uno.</string>
          </description>
